com.erikartymiuk.badbudgetlogic.main

Class CreditCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.erikartymiuk.badbudgetlogic.main.MoneyOwed
      • com.erikartymiuk.badbudgetlogic.main.CreditCard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Source

    public class CreditCard
extends MoneyOwed
implements Source
    A type of MoneyOwed. Represents credit cards which have the additional property of being able to be a source for BudgetItems and moneyLosses. Currently, however, cannot be used to pay loans.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CreditCard

        public CreditCard(java.lang.String name,
                  double debt,
                  boolean quicklook,
                  double interestRate)
           throws BadBudgetInvalidValueException
        Constructor for the credit card class.
        Parameters:
        name - - String descriptor of this credit card
        debt - - Current negative balance on this credit card
        quicklook - - indicates if this credit card should be considered for quicklook
        interestRate - - the interest rate for this credit card. compounds daily.
        Throws:
        BadBudgetInvalidValueException

    • Method Detail

      • predictLossForDayIndex

        public void predictLossForDayIndex(java.lang.String destinationDescription,
                                   double lossAmount,
                                   boolean addBack,
                                   double addBackAmount,
                                   int dayIndex)
        Source interface implementation for credit cards. This will increase the debt on the credit card by the loss amount. This is the predict loss implementation for use with the prediction algorithm. It processes the loss for this source by updating its prediction rows appropriately. This method also handles an add back to the source.
        Specified by:
        predictLossForDayIndex in interface Source
        Parameters:
        destinationDescription - - a string description of what the funds are being used for. Used for the transaction history
        lossAmount - - the amount of funds needed
        addBack - - true if the destination is a budget item and that budget item has funds to add back to this credit card (reduces debt)
        addBackAmount - - the amount to add back to the source (if applicable)
        dayIndex - - the date as an index or offset from prediction start date

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Date predictEndDate,
                   int dayIndex)
        After running the prediction algorithm this method updates this credit card's values to the value's it would have on the day represented by day index. If a goal is set it is assumed to be invalid (TODO verify/correct the last sentence, 4/7/2017)
        Overrides:
        update in class MoneyOwed
        Parameters:
        predictEndDate - - the date our prediction algorithm ends. Any interest calculations treat this + 1 as the start date. (note uses GOAL_LIMIT_YEARS as the limit for the goal date calculation)
        dayIndex - - the day, as an offset from the start date used in the prediction algorithm, to update this credit cards values to.
